name: AlternisRL
description:
AlternisRL is a short cyberpunk dungeon crawler with asyncronous multiplayer functionality.

All players play the same randomly generated dungeons and can leave messages written on the ground for other plays to see (Ala Souls). You also might catch a glimpse of other players if they are playing at the same time.

It was my first time using phaser so some minor boiler plate code to get rendering and gun working (Just rendering a blank map with a character) was done prior to the jam, but other than that all code was done during the 7 days (And most of that boiler plate was removed or refactored for performance or to fix bugs). 

You can play it here: https://roguelike.alternis.space/
